TopicTitle: I really test the nerves of my Kerbals... You?

Articles.Content:
I wonder sometimes what they thought they were getting into when they joined the space program.

This was a perfectly sane re-entry from Mun with Deadly Re-entry, FAR, etc.. Silly little lizards.

I wonder sometimes what they thought they were getting into when they joined the space program.

This was a perfectly sane re-entry from Mun with Deadly Re-entry, FAR, etc.. Silly little lizards.

http://i.imgur.com/VOSlfoy.png

All I know is my reentries look like big I-s. If you have the fuel, why not use it?

I wonder sometimes what they thought they were getting into when they joined the space program.

They were given free snacks in the astronaut complex. Anyway, kerbal psychotests are totally underpar.

I usually have a opposite problem: They laugh like crazy just seconds before death.
No, but I think it's time to build a centrifuge. If they aren't scared by that, they are obviously related to Jeb: He cannot know that there are OTHERS.
Especially when they dont want to wear a properly tailored suit.
